siteMetadata.title: Mazen Emam
siteMetadata.description: Mazen Emam is a Software Engineer specializing in frontend development with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Based in Egypt, he builds high-performance user interfaces and operational tools for manufacturing, analytics, and recruitment sectors across MENA and Europe.
siteMetadata.author: Mazen Emam
siteMetadata.bio: Mazen Emam is a Software Engineer based in Egypt, specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. He helps companies enhance user experiences and operational efficiency through data-driven frontend solutions.
